mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTION( user_id, travel_id, mention_created_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{travelId}, #{createdDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.mention_id as mentionId, m.user_id as userId, m.travel_id as travelId, t.travel_title as title, m.mention_created_date as createdDate, u.user_nickname as nickname FROM MENTION m, Travel t, USER u WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.travel_id = t.travel_id AND u.user_id = t.user_id
